text:
Employees of mobile
truck post offices engaged under contract in the carriage of United States mails
are engaged in interstate commerce, since they are either transporting goods
across State lines or as part of the stream of interstate commerce.
html: Employees of mobile truck post offices engaged under contract in the carriage of United States mails are engaged in interstate commerce, since they are either transporting goods across State lines or as part of the stream of interstate commerce.
